price: አንዳችሁን ሞት በመጣበት ጊዜ ሀብትን ቢተው ለወላጆችና ለቅርብ ዘመዶች በበጎ መናዘዝ በናንተ ላይ ተጻፈ፡፡ (ይህ) በጥንቁቆቹ ላይ እርግጠኛ ድንጋጌ ተደነገገ፡፡
arabic: كُتِبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ إِن تَرَكَ خَيۡرًا ٱلۡوَصِيَّةُ لِلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ وَٱلۡأَقۡرَبِينَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kutiba ʿalaykum idhā ḥaḍara aḥadakumu al-mawtu in taraka khayran al-waṣiyatu lil'wālidayni wal-aqrabīna bil-maʿrūfi ḥaqqan ʿalā al-mutaqīna
